name: Chrono Warrior
description:
"Chrono Warrior" is an action-packed game where players take on the role of a small, but fearless warrior. The twist in this game is that whenever the warrior takes a hit, you loses precious time from this game. The objective of the game is to navigate through a challenging level filled with obstacles and enemies, while conserving as much time as possible.

The game features fast-paced and intense combat, where players must dodge enemy attacks, perform quick and precise strikes, and use special abilities to defeat the enemies.
